On 13 Jan 1969, my Father Col Norm Eaton and co-pilot LTC Paul Getchell, took off at night to fly an interdiction mission over the Ho Chi Minh trail in Laos. Ordinance delivered, these men then provided CAS for SF troops in contact. They went missing for 38 years. We remember.
